snippet: Quarterback Sam Bradford threw two touchdown passes as St. Louis moved above .500 for the first time since 2006.
abstract: NFL Roundup; St Louis Rams defeat Arizona Cardinals, 17-3; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Quarterback Sam Bradford threw two touchdown passes as St. Louis moved above .500 for the first time since 2006.

headline.seo: With 9 Sacks, Rams Hand Cardinals Their First Loss
